edu.teco.smartlambda.lambda

Class LambdaDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.teco.smartlambda.lambda.AbstractLambda
      • edu.teco.smartlambda.lambda.LambdaDecorator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MonitoringDecorator, PermissionDecorator

    public abstract class LambdaDecorator
extends AbstractLambda
    A decorator for lambdas that can be extended and partially overridden to add behaviour to existing lambda calls. By calling the super method, the lambda functionality or any decorator surrounding the lambda will be called.
